mapper.sql: id, device_id, from_status, to_status, operate_time, operate_user_id, from_location_id, to_location_id
mapper.select: select dsr.id, dsr.operate_time,dsr.from_status,dsr.to_status , u.id operateUserId, u.real_name operateUserRealName, l.name fromLocation,l2.name toLocation from device_status_record dsr left join user u on u.id = dsr.operate_user_id left join location l on l.id = dsr.from_location_id left join location l2 on l2.id = dsr.to_location_id where device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into device_status_record
id,
device_id,
from_status,
to_status,
operate_time,
operate_user_id,
from_location_id
to_location_id
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fromStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{toStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fromLocationId}
#{toLocationId}

insert into device_status_record(id, device_id, from_status, to_status, operate_user_id,from_location_id,to_location_id ) values
(#{i.id},#{i.deviceId},#{i.fromStatus},#{i.toStatus},#{i.operateUserId},#{fromLocationId},#{toLocationId})
mapper.update: update device_status_record set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_status = #{fromStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, to_status = #{toStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, from_location_id = #{fromLocationId}, to_location_id = #{toLocationId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
